AT.name: Resident Evil™ The Mercenaries 3D
AT.description: In einem Rennen gegen die Zeit versuchen die Spieler, so viele Gegner wie möglich zu eliminieren, bevor die Uhr abgelaufen ist. Den Spielern bietet sich in "Resident Evil: The Mercenaries 3D" eine Vielzahl von Gameplay-Varianten. Sie können beispielsweise auf eine Solo-Mission gehen oder sich mit einem zweiten Spieler zusammentun und die Schar der Gegner gemeinsam bekämpfen. Darüber hinaus verfügt das Spiel über das brandneue Feature Skill Slot. Die Resident Evil-Fans dürfen damit drei von insgesamt 30 zur Auswahl stehenden Fähigkeiten aufwerten. Sie verbessern zum Beispiel ihre Waffenfertigkeiten, ihre Nachladegeschwindigkeit oder ihre Kampfkünste und staffieren ihre Charaktere so aus, dass sie möglichst gut zu ihrer Spielweise passen.

AU.name: Resident Evil™ The Mercenaries 3D
AU.description: It’s a race against time as players compete to defeat as many enemies as possible before the countdown reaches zero. Resident Evil: The Mercenaries 3D offers players a variety of gameplay formats with a solo mission option or the ability to team up with others across the world in two-player co-op via Internet Play. The game also includes the addition of an all new Skill Slot feature. Players will be able to fill three skill slots from a selection of 30 skills including improvements to weapon performance, reload speed or melee abilities and customise characters to best suit their style of play.

BG.name: Resident Evil™ The Mercenaries 3D
BG.description: It’s a race against time as players compete to defeat as many enemies as possible before the countdown reaches zero. BE.name: Resident Evil™ The Mercenaries 3D
BE.description: Le temps vous est compté tandis que vous tentez de vaincre autant d'ennemis que possible avant la fin du compte à rebours. Le jeu comprend une toute nouvelle fonctionnalité nommée « Skill Slot » : les joueurs auront la possibilité de choisir 3 compétences spéciales parmi les 30 disponibles qui comprennent, par exemple, la possibilité d’améliorer les armes, de recharger plus vite ou d’apprendre de nouvelles techniques au corps à corps, à vous donc d’adapter les bonnes capacités à votre style de jeu (plutôt tireur d’élite ou expert du couteau ?)

ES.name: Resident Evil™ The Mercenaries 3D
ES.description: En una carrera contra el reloj los jugadores tendrán que derrotar a tantos enemigos como les sea posible antes de que el tiempo se agote. Resident Evil: The Mercenaries 3D ofrece distintas formas de juego con una opción de misión a solas o con la posibilidad de juntarse a otros jugadores de cualquier parte del mundo en un modo cooperativo para dos a través del juego por internet. El juego incluye además una nueva función denominada Skill Slot en la que los jugadores podrán completar tres niveles de habilidad de los 30 disponibles que incluyen mejoras en el manejo de las armas, velocidad de carga y habilidad en las melés, además de personajes personalizados que se adaptan a cada estilo de juego.

IT.name: Resident Evil™ The Mercenaries 3D
IT.description: Si tratta di una corsa contro il tempo nella quale i giocatori devono sconfiggere quanti più nemici possibili prima che finisca il conto alla rovescia. Resident Evil: The Mercenaries 3D offre ai giocatori tantissime modalità di gioco diverse, che spaziano dalle missioni in solitario alla possibilità di fare squadra con utenti di tutto il mondo nella modalità cooperativa per due giocatori via Internet. Il gioco presenta inoltre la nuovissima funzionalità Slot abilità. I giocatori potranno riempire tre slot abilità scegliendo fra una serie di 30 abilità diverse che includono, fra le altre, prestazioni migliori per le armi, maggiore velocità di ricarica o abilità di tipo "melee", che consentono di adattare il personaggio al proprio stile di gioco.

NL.name: Resident Evil™ The Mercenaries 3D
NL.description: Spelers nemen het tegen elkaar op in een race tegen de klok om zoveel mogelijk vijanden te verslaan, voor de teller op nul komt te staan. Resident Evil: The Mercenaries 3D bevat diverse spelvarianten die niet alleen geschikt zijn voor een enkele speler maar online ook door twee samenwerkende spelers kunnen worden gespeeld. Spelers kunnen daarbij handig gebruik maken van de geheel nieuwe Skill Slot-functie. Deze functie laat spelers drie Skill Slots vullen met hun keuze uit dertig verschillende vaardigheden, zoals wapenversterkers, herlaadversnellers of vechtacties. Zo kan de speler een personage afstemmen op zijn eigen speelstijl.

NZ.name: Resident Evil™ The Mercenaries 3D
NZ.description: It’s a race against time as players compete to defeat as many enemies as possible before the countdown reaches zero. Resident Evil: The Mercenaries 3D offers players a variety of gameplay formats with a solo mission option or the ability to team up with others across the world in two-player co-op via Internet Play. The game also includes the addition of an all new Skill Slot feature. PL.name: Resident Evil™ The Mercenaries 3D
PL.description: It’s a race against time as players compete to defeat as many enemies as possible before the countdown reaches zero. Resident Evil: The Mercenaries 3D offers players a variety of gameplay formats with a solo mission option or the ability to team up with others across the world in two-player co-op via Internet Play. The game also includes the addition of an all new Skill Slot feature. Players will be able to fill three skill slots from a selection of 30 skills including improvements to weapon performance, reload speed or melee abilities and customise characters to best suit their style of play.

PT.name: Resident Evil™ The Mercenaries 3D
PT.description: Os jogadores correm contra o tempo para derrotarem o maior número de inimigos possíveis antes que o tempo se esgote. Resident Evil: The Mercenaries 3D oferece aos jogadores uma variedade de formatos de jogo com a opção de missão a solo ou a possibilidade de se juntarem a outra pessoa no modo cooperativo para dois jogadores via Internet Play. O jogo inclui também uma nova função denominada Skill Slot em que os jogadores poderão preencher três níveis de habilidades de uma seleção de 30 que inclui melhorias ao desempenho das armas, à velocidade de recarga e às possibilidades de combate a curta distância. Para além disso, os jogadores terão a oportunidade de equiparem as suas personagens da forma que melhor se adequar ao seu estilo de jogo.

RU.name: Resident Evil™ The Mercenaries 3D
RU.description: Эта игра доступна только на английском, французском, итальянском, немецком и испанском языках. It’s a race against time as players compete to defeat as many enemies as possible before the countdown reaches zero. Resident Evil: The Mercenaries 3D offers players a variety of gameplay formats with a solo mission option or the ability to team up with others across the world in two-player co-op via Internet Play. The game also includes the addition of an all new Skill Slot feature. Players will be able to fill three skill slots from a selection of 30 skills including improvements to weapon performance, reload speed or melee abilities and customise characters to best suit their style of play.
